It also broke The Living Daylights record ($11 million) for the highest weekend debut for a spy film. It was also the biggest opener for a film outside of Thanksgiving or summer, beating Beverly Hills Cops $15.2 million. || https://www.boxofficemojo.com/weekend/1990W09/?ref_=bo_rl_table_11 |- | 10 ||
